```{shinylive-r}
#| standalone: true
#| viewerHeight: 800
library(shiny)
library(bslib)
library(palmerpenguins)

ui <- page_sidebar(
  sidebar = sidebar(
    selectInput("variable",
                "Variable:",
                c("Species" = "species",
                  "Island" = "island",
                  "Bill Length" = "bill_length_mm"),
                selected = "species")),
  verbatimTextOutput("summary",
                     placeholder = TRUE)
  
)


server <- function(input, output) {
  
  x <- reactive({
    penguins[[input$variable]]
  })
  output$summary <- renderPrint({ 
    summary(x())
  })
  
}

shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)



```
